definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: I think he will be the best of the best.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，他将会成为出色球员中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: What the Rocket fears are teams of using fast attack, and the Phoenix Suns is just outstanding at it.
sentences.chinese: 火箭最怵那些打快攻的球队，太阳则是其中的佼佼者。
在所有的姊妹中她是佼佼者。

sentences.english: John was a superstar, a one in a million programmer.
sentences.chinese: 约翰是一百万的程序员中的佼佼者，超级明星。

sentences.english: Literary talent fighting skill, governs a nation square slightly, I am a Jiao Jiao.
sentences.chinese: 文才武功，治国方略，我都是佼佼者。

sentences.english: Those three are probably our stand-out players of the season in terms of consistency.
sentences.chinese: 就稳定性而言，他们三个可能是本赛季球队的佼佼者。

sentences.english: My friend Davey is the best of the bunch.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友戴维是这伙为当中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: The contestants in the current model competition are the best from all the provinces.
sentences.chinese: 参加本届模特大赛的选手都是各省选来的佼佼者。

sentences.english: But collard greens, with about 375 micrograms per half.
sentences.chinese: 而芥兰是其中佼佼者，每半杯含量达375微克。

sentences.english: Revivalist Islamic groups are amongst the most deadly.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰的信仰复兴组织是其中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: He's been a great scorer for lousy teams. He's been a brilliant entertainer in a band of dullards .
sentences.chinese: 他是烂队的伟大得分手，他是一群笨蛋中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: In addition, sunflower seeds are also in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 此外，葵花子也是瓜子中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, all three have been vociferous champions of gold and other precious metals.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在黄金和其他贵金属领域他们也是佼佼者。

sentences.english: These points make Bejo a leading company in the seed industry.
sentences.chinese: 这叁种特质使Bejo成为种子行业中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: Being an outstanding writer among those in Henan Province during the new period, Qiao Dianyun is deeply aware of it .
sentences.chinese: 作为新时期河南作家群中的佼佼者乔典运深谙此理。

sentences.english: The Shilin (Chinese for stone forest) is an impressive example of karst topography.
sentences.chinese: 石林是岩溶地形的佼佼者。

definition: an up-and-coming youngster/new talent/a brilliant younger generation
reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
top-notch (colloquial)/to push oneself to the front

to come first in triennial palace examinations (idiom, refers to the carved stone turtle head in front of the imperial palace, next to which the most successful candidate in the imperial examinations was entitled to stand)/to be the champion/to be the very best in any field
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)
Cenozoic (geological era covering the last 65m years)
